title: Geiser Pharma | LinkedIn
description: Geiser Pharma | 5312 seguidores en LinkedIn. We are a pharmaceutical company with headquarters in Pamplona specialized in research and development activities of value-added products, by implementing innovative technologies and new drug delivery systems within the main pharmaceutical areas: Niche generic Rx products Healthcare OTC products CE marked Medical Devices Our qualified, multidisciplinary and flexible team combines all the necessary competencies to deliver innovation and lead to client's success, offering a complete integrated project management which includes all stages of the medicine value chain.
